statements: DELETE FROM customer_survey_data WHERE customer_id = 1 AND satisfaction_score = 5
DELETE FROM customer_survey_data WHERE survey_response LIKE '%negative%'
DELETE FROM customer_survey_data WHERE customer_id = 100 AND satisfaction_score < 3;
DELETE FROM predictive_analytics_models WHERE prediction_date < '2023-01-01' AND satisfaction_level >= 80;

DELETE FROM survey_responses WHERE question_id = 1 AND response_id = 10;
